verses.translation: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he

verses.text: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.translation: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained
verses.transliteration: Ma aghna AAanhu maluhu wama kasaba

verses.translation: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame
And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood
Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber
